name: Sleep Well Acquisition Corp.
description: Sleep Well Acquisition Corp. is a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) focused on identifying and merging with innovative companies in the sleep and wellness industry. Founded with the mission to enhance the quality of life through better sleep solutions, SWAN aims to leverage its expertise in finance and operations to support and scale businesses that are dedicated to improving sleep health. The company seeks to partner with firms that are developing groundbreaking products, technologies, and services related to sleep, whether through advanced sleep technology, sleep health services, or innovative sleep-related consumer products. With a growing awareness of the importance of sleep for overall health and well-being, SWAN is positioned to capitalize on this trend by identifying potential targets that align with its vision. The management team brings extensive experience in both the finance and wellness sectors, enabling them to strategically navigate the complexities of the market and facilitate successful mergers. By focusing on this niche market, SWAN aims to create long-term value for its investors while contributing positively to the broader community by promoting better sleep habits and solutions.

faq.answer: Michael L. Smith is the CEO of Sleep Well Acquisition Corp.

faq.answer: Sleep Well Acquisition Corp. is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Sleep Well Acquisition Corp. focuses on the finance and health & wellness industries.

faq.question: When was Sleep Well Acquisition Corp. founded?
faq.answer: Sleep Well Acquisition Corp. was founded in 2020.
